short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension used to know your friends' ratings on Codeforces

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay on top of your competitive programming game with the Codeforces Rating Extension! This powerful tool allows you to monitor your and your friends' current and maximum ratings on Codeforces without the need to visit the website.

Key Features:

->Instant Rating: Easily check your current and maximum ratings on Codeforces at any time.
->Friend Tracking: Add friends by simply entering their Codeforces username and track their ratings effortlessly.

Whether youâ€™re a seasoned competitive programmer or just starting out, this extension is designed to help you track progress, set goals, and enhance your competitive programming skills. Stay connected, stay informed, and stay ahead with the Codeforces Rating Tracker Extension!

Note: When any contest is going on, we are unable to fetch data so extension might not work at that time.
